Description:

It seems that the method below doesn't judge whether the parameter--value is 
null.
	public static String getCssText(short type, String value) {
		switch (type) {
		case CSSPrimitiveValue.CSS_URI:
			return "url(" + value + ")";

		case CSSPrimitiveValue.CSS_STRING:
			char q = (value.indexOf('"') != -1) ? '\'' : '"';
			return q + value + q;
		}
		return value;
	}
